aboutParagraphs: Note: as of 4/13/2020, I am on a 90-day furlough from SentryOne where I am/was a Senior Software Development Engineer focused on improving the quality of life for Microsoft data professionals and their customers.
Strong leader focusing on adding value to organizations via solid understanding of business needs.
Proven strengths in communication and training, both via organizational team building as well as conference speaking engagements.
Well-versed in team leadership via both remote and on-site work.
Welcome and thank you for visiting this page!
